author: The Rev. Al Sharpton
title: Coronavirus deaths reveal a startling truth about America's 'two pandemics'
description: We are watching a crisis within a crisis unfold before us. We must expose it and also ensure that when we rebuild and re-emerge, we take strategic steps to rectify it.
content: Every day, we are inundated with information about the horrors of the coronavirus pandemic. We hear about the rising number of deaths, the increasing rate of infections, the mental anguish, the shortages of critical supplies in hospitals, the people strugglin… [+3887 chars]
